channel.title: 1.7.0.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7.0.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.6
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.0.6 is now available. This maintenance release closes 5 pull requests, among which a security issue.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.5
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.0.5 is now available. This maintenance release closes 29 issues. This new version is part our plan to release more monthly patch version for both v1.7 and v1.6.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.4
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.0.4 is now available. This maintenance release closes 29 of the most pressing issues reported since v1.7.0.0 was released.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.3
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.0.3 is now available. This maintenance release closes 28 of the most pressing issues reported since v1.7.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.2
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.0.2 is now available. This maintenance release closes 13 of the most pressing issues reported since v1.7.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.1
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.0.1 is now available. This maintenance release closes 15 of the most pressing issues reported since v1.7.0.0
